Welcome!

This LibGuide will provide information for Small Business Management (SMB 2000). You will find links to helpful databases and websites, as well as books in the library and ebooks available to you online through the library book catalog.

Use the tabs above to navigate this LibGuide.

Your Hawk Card is also your Library Card

With the HawkCard you can:

  • Check out books, etc. from the library
  • Use HCC's online research resources
  • Print and photocopy

Access the online resources linked from the HCC Libraries site.

  1. Input the 7-digit student ID# from your card.
  2. Input the last 4 digits of your ID# for the PIN.
    • For example, if your ID# were 0456789, your PIN would be 6789.
  3. To change your PIN access “My Account”. Click on “PIN” to change it.
  4. Having trouble logging in? Contact an HCC campus library.
